cs213.photoalbum.model

Interface IAlbum

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.String>, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Album

    public interface IAlbum
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.String>
    Author:
    Mark Labrador

    A sub-model for the collection of albums.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAlbumName

        java.lang.String getAlbumName()
        Gets the album's name.
        Returns:
        Album name.

      • setAlbumName

        void setAlbumName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the album's name.
        Parameters:
        name - Album name.

      • getAlbumSize

        int getAlbumSize()
        Gets the number of photos contained in the album.
        Returns:
        Number of photos in album.

      • addPhoto

        boolean addPhoto(IPhoto photo)
        Adds a photo to the album, if it does not already exists. Otherwise, lets user know it already exists and does nothing. This should also keep track of the size of the album by incrementing a counter every time a photo is added.
        Parameters:
        photo - Photo to be added.
        Returns:

      • deletePhoto

        void deletePhoto(java.lang.String id)
        Deletes a photo in the album, if it exists. Otherwise, lets user know it already exists and does nothing. This should also keep track of the size of the album by decrementing a counter every time a photo is removed.
        Parameters:
        id - Photo identifier.

      • getPhotoList

        java.util.List<IPhoto> getPhotoList()
        This is a list of photos contained in the album.
        Returns:
        A full list of photos contained in this album.

      • recaptionPhoto

        void recaptionPhoto(java.lang.String photoId,
                  java.lang.String caption)
        Recaptions a photo in the album, if it exists. Otherwise, lets user know it already exists and does nothing.
        Parameters:
        photoId - Photo identifier.
        caption - New caption.
